basics.name: Akhil Shukla
basics.label: Software Developer at INTEL
basics.summary: I currently work at Intel as a Software Developer. I have completed my Bachelors in Electronics and Communications Engg. (2013 - 2017), and am also currently pursuing a PGD in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence from IIIT-B(Dec 2019 - Dec 2020).

courses: Python Programming for Event Handling and Game Development

work.summary: Development of ML based Web APIs
highlights: Responsible for the web api development for listing memories used by several teams in Intel
This Web API is based on a Deep Learning Neural Network Optimizer that optimizes Power, Performance, Area parameters, for a given user input.

work.summary: Modem Layer-1 Firmware Development for 4G/5G Intel modems
highlights: Responsible for development of features to support cell search, measurement
Code Maintenance and debugging for frequent defects and issues.

work.summary: Conformance Testing and Protocol Stacking (CT-PS) Intern
highlights: Responsible for testing Call Processing and Call Features. Learnt the GERAN, UTRAN (2G, 3G) network architectures.
Call processing flow and validation of Network Simulator driven feature tests.

volunteer.summary: Active Volunteer for YRC VIT branch
highlights: Spreading awareness via Campaigns organized in campus

volunteer.summary: Org. IEEE PES tech symposiums, projects

awards.title: Amul Vidya Shree Award
awards.summary: The Amul Vidya Shree Award recognizes and rewards Class X toppers across India.

awards.title: Hindustan Pratibha Samman Medal 2011
awards.summary: Awarded Hindustan Pratibha Samman Gold medal for being the school topper in Class X. A special mention in the Hindustan newspaper too for outstanding performance..
